translation.en: Free Tibet! Free Tibet!
Return the Dalai Lama to Tibet!
[woman over TV] --largest trading partner.
Shadow Foreign Affairs Minister Eloise Barnes
translation.ko: 재야 내각 외무부 장관 엘로이스 반스는

translation.en: has been accusing the Toohey government of inaction and incompetence
translation.ko: 투히 정부의 대응 부족을 두고 그 무책임과 무능을

translation.en: over their lack of response...
Hey! You need to clear the area.
-What-- What happened to him? -Drowned.
You're a journo. Daily Nation, right?
Yeah, Harriet Dunkley. Who am I speaking to?
Media Liaison.
-I'm sure you've got their number. -What will they tell me?
translation.ko: 공보관요 번호 아실 텐데요 무슨 얘길 해주겠어요?

translation.en: There's a killer shark in Lake Burley Griffin?
This is a crime scene. Let's go.
-So, what have we got on Sabine Hobbs? -Gus, I swear, if you make me do
translation.ko: 자, 사빈 홉스 건 뭐 있어? 거스, 사빈 홉스 기사 또 쓰라고 하시면

translation.en: another story on her, I'll self-immolate.
translation.ko: 거스, 사빈 홉스 기사 또 쓰라고 하시면 저 분신해버릴 거예요

translation.en: [Gus] What do we know about this prison that China's moved her to--
translation.ko: 중국 정부가 사빈 홉스를 보냈다는 교도소는...

translation.en: Harbin Provincial Women's Prison.
She'd be better off if she hadn't survived her third-degree burns.
It's where they send Uyghur terrorists.
I don't think even the Chinese can pretend a misguided choirgirl is a terrorist.
translation.ko: 중국도 철없는 성가대원을 테러리스트로 꾸미진 못해요

translation.en: Yeah, 20 years in maximum security says they can.
-Harri? -Yeah?
-Any word out of the PM's office? -Uh, no.
Everyone's clammed up since sentencing. Cabinet, backbench, all got the muzzle on.
translation.ko: 선고 이후로 다 입 다물었어요 내각, 평의원들 전부 다요

translation.en: We're back to recycling an expert and speculating on the speculation, is that what we're doing?
translation.ko: 그럼 우린 중국통이나 다시 만나서 추론해야겠네요?

translation.en: If we have to run the same sob story as the tabloids,
translation.ko: 황색언론처럼 최루성 기사나 써야 한다면 그렇겠지

translation.en: we need a fig leaf of respectability. Get me something.
Well, the video's had more than 3 million hits on YouTube.
Since when did YouTube become news?
About ten years ago, I think.
Right, so, we've got the Medicare thing, the senate estimate, childcare rebates.
translation.ko: 자, 그럼 메디케어랑 상원 예산안, 보육 할인

translation.en: [Griff] There's rumblings of a leadership spill.
-Which party? -The Greens.
Anything else?
Uh, I've got something.
Corpse, on the lake. Washed up this morning.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침 호수에 시체가 밀려 왔어요

translation.en: -Wasn't your career, was it? -It was your sex life, actually.
translation.ko: - 밀린 건 네 커리어잖아? - 네 성생활이지

translation.en: Yeah, Harriet, I'm afraid a pissed-up ANU student fallen in the drink's
not exactly a national political bombshell.
No, but this one was gutted like a fish.
translation.ko: 그 시체는 생선 마냥 내장이 제거됐어요

translation.en: All right, run with it. See where it leads.
Back to it, people.
Sorry.
Hey, Sasha, did you see who put this on my desk?
translation.ko: 사샤, 내 책상의 이거 누가 뒀는지 봤어?

translation.en: [Sasha] Is that Mal Paxton?
Yeah.
Not touching it.
-Should I order everyone some tea? -We're not running a café, Ronnie.
[McAuliffe] In the past 72 hours,
Beijing have moved Shenyang J-16 fighter jets
onto the disputed islands in the South China Sea.
All our chatter says Chinese command is on high alert.
translation.ko: 다들 중국 사령부가 만반의 준비를 했답니다

translation.en: -They expect the U.S. to blink. -And will they?
They've invited us to join naval exercises in the disputed waters.
translation.ko: 분쟁 해역 내 해군 훈련에 우리의 참가를 요청해왔습니다

translation.en: HMAS Anzac's ready to sail.
Minister, we are woefully unprepared for a military buildup.
translation.ko: 장관님, 안타깝게도 우리는 군비 증강 대비가 미비합니다

translation.en: We need two new submarines quickly.
We can acquire Soryus off the shelf in Japan.
translation.ko: 일본 소류급 잠수함을 즉시 도입할 수 있습니다

translation.en: If we don't act,
Beijing will take control of the world's busiest sea lane, unchallenged.
translation.ko: 유동량이 가장 많은 항로를 중국이 장악하고 말 겁니다

translation.en: -We cannot afford to sit on our hands. -I agree.
So, we send our own message.
We won't be throwing warships into a U.S.-led pissing contest.
translation.ko: 미국이 벌인 싸움판에 우리 전함은 안 보냅니다

translation.en: We tell our allies to piss somewhere else.
translation.ko: 동맹국들은 다른 데 가서 싸우라고 해요

translation.en: I won't be shifting on policy.
Those submarines will be made here, at ASC Osborne.
translation.ko: 여기 ASC 오즈번에서 잠수함을 건조할 겁니다

translation.en: It's a big boost for local manufacture.
Minister, the Japanese contract is billions of dollars cheaper.
translation.ko: 일본과 계약하는 게 수십억 달러 쌉니다

translation.en: So, we cancel a few joint strike fighters.
translation.ko: 합동 타격 전투기를 몇 대 취소하죠

translation.en: The Pentagon won't like it.
Well, I don't work for the Pentagon, general. Neither do you.
translation.ko: 난 미 국방성을 위해서 일하지 않습니다, 장군도요

translation.en: I won't be taking this to Cabinet.
Minister, with respect...
your previous experience is as Minister for Resources.
And your previous experience is as a soldier, general.
So, you should know how to follow an order.
Fucking hate Labor governments.
[receptionist over phone] Australian Federal Police.
Could you put me through to the pathologist on duty?
-Who should I say is calling? -[Harriet] Media Liaison.
[receptionist] Putting you through.
[woman] Pathology.
[Harriet] Hi, it's Harriet Dunkley from the Daily Nation.
I'm calling regarding the dead body on the lake this morning.
I was wondering if you had examined--
[woman] You know the drill. You have to go through Media Liaison.
[Harriet] We know they're going to give me the runaround--
It's me. She's on her way to the morgue.
translation.ko: 나야, 해리엇이 시신 안치소로 가고 있어

translation.en: Anything from our friend at the embassy?
I'm coming in now, if this gentleman would just hold the door open for me.
translation.ko: 지금 가요, 여기 신사분이 문만 잡아주시면요

translation.en: Thank you very much, sir.
Who says chivalry's dead? [chuckles]
Oi! Can I see your security pass?
"Senior Constable Brimmer."
Journos. Sell your own grandmother.
Are you in the market for a grandmother?
-[Harriet] He's only a kid. -[Brimmer] Twenty-four years old.
-Has his family made the ID? -You know I can't answer that.
translation.ko: - 가족이 확인했나요? - 말 못 하는 거 알잖아요

translation.en: Any personal effects?
Being held in evidence.
So, you have a name and date of birth.
-You're going to have to speak to-- -Yeah, yeah, Media Liaison.
Any theories on who or why he was cut open?
translation.ko: 누가 왜 배를 갈랐는지 짚이는 거 있어요?

translation.en: Strictly off the record.
Did he swallow something?
Media Liaison.
Come on, all I need is an ID.
translation.ko: 말 좀 해봐요 신원만 알면 돼요

translation.en: You might want to read the writing on the wall on this one, Harriet.
translation.ko: 벽에 쓰여 있는 걸 읽어보시는 게 좋겠네요

translation.en: Fuck you, Griff.
[Gus] Your corpse from the lake?
Hey, Gus?
I got a name from a uniform at the morgue.
But get this, he has no social-media presence.
translation.ko: 그런데 이상한 게 SNS 계정이 없어요

translation.en: No Facebook, no Instagram, no Twitter.
What 24-year-old has no online presence?
You're asking me?
Well, I know kids that'd rather be dead than not on Snapchat.
translation.ko: 애들은 스냅챗 못 쓰면 답답해 죽잖아요

translation.en: Well, maybe he had an alias. That's what my kids do.
translation.ko: 가명을 썼을지도 모르지 우리 애들이 그러거든

translation.en: Keep away prying parents.
Yeah, maybe.
Do you still have [over speaker] that contact at Births Deaths and Marriages?
translation.ko: 출생 사망 결혼 등기소에 아직 연줄 있어요?

translation.en: [Gus] Yeah.
-[Harriet] Can I get that off you? -Sure.
[Harriet] Thank you.
[Gus] Fancy doing things the old-fashioned way?
[Harriet] Dalgetty may not have a Facebook profile,
translation.ko: 네, 맥스 달게티가 페이스북 프로필은 없어도

translation.en: but I assume that he must have been born.
It does feel odd there's no digital footprint for someone from a generation
translation.ko: 사생활이라곤 없는 세대가 디지털 흔적이 없다니

translation.en: -that doesn't believe in privacy. -Vaughn.
Taking a personal interest in Dalgetty?
This has a whiff of Beijing about it. It's central to my brief.
translation.ko: 중국 정부의 냄새가 나요 제 주요 업무잖아요

translation.en: And the obvious conflict of interest?
translation.ko: 공사 구분 못 하는 거 아니고?

translation.en: Are you directing me to red-flag it?
It's best there's no confusion in matters of X versus Y.
translation.ko: 남녀 관계는 분명히 하는 게 좋아

translation.en: Don't you think, Ms. Gordon?
He runs from the Chinese Embassy
and ends up dead by the lake. Aren't you interested?
The rules are there to protect us.
Hey, Brimmer! It's a false ID.
-What do you mean? -It's a stolen identity.
I called the registry.
There's only a record for one Max Dalgetty in the whole country,
translation.ko: 전국에 맥스 달게티는 딱 한 명뿐인데

translation.en: and he died seven years ago.
He's the same age profile as the deceased on the lake,
but you'll have to check the body for markings
-and the dental records. -Well, it's a bit late for that.
translation.ko: - 확인해봐야 할 거예요 - 그게, 좀 늦었네요

translation.en: -What do you mean? -The body's already been transferred.
translation.ko: - 무슨 소리예요? - 그 시신은 이미 이송됐어요

translation.en: -Transferred where? -I don't know.
You don't know or you're not allowed to tell me?
Both.
Okay, something strange is going on here.
That, that's not Max Dalgetty.
translation.ko: 보세요, 이 시신은 맥스 달게티가 아니에요

translation.en: -Something's happening to your phone. -What?
No.
No! No!
New-age burglary. That's a little outside my jurisdiction.
-[computer chimes] -Hello, Harri.
[Kim] We didn't wipe your photo.
Well, I notice you haven't denied monitoring my phone.
translation.ko: 내 전화 감시하는 건 부인하지 않는구나

translation.en: ASD categorically denies tracing,
-monitoring and intercepting -[snores] all domestic calls.
-Yeah. -Harri.
Can you get Thomas to take a look at it?
Because if ASD didn't delete my Dalgetty picture,
translation.ko: 달게티 사진 지운 게 ASD가 아니라면

translation.en: then maybe he can find out who did.
When did I become your research assistant?
translation.ko: 내가 언제부터 네 조수가 된 거야?

translation.en: Don't pretend you don't want to know.
-Okay. -Thank you.
-That's a new dress. -Yeah, you like it?
Yeah, I do.
You would tell me?
Yes.
-Is there someone special? -No.
No, no, no.
Nothing like that.
Thought you weren't going near it, Harri.
[Bailey] Which rock have you been hiding under
not to know about the $30 billion sinkhole,
otherwise known as the Collins Class cock-up
by those halfwits in Osborne?
The only reason they got the subs contract in the first place
translation.ko: 그 잠수함 계약 이유는 애초에 단 한 가지

translation.en: was pork-barreling for a by-election.
Don't think I don't know what you're up to...
or that you've got Beijing on fucking speed dial.
translation.ko: 중국 정부랑 긴밀히 연락하는 것도 알아요

translation.en: Sixty percent of our trade goes through those shipping lanes.
There's only one way to force China to back down.
We stand by the U.S. and their allies,
translation.ko: 미국과 그 동맹국들의 편에 서는 겁니다

translation.en: and we bring in strike fighters and we bring in submarines.
Japanese submarines,
made by people who make things that actually work.
translation.ko: 제대로 된 물건을 만드는 사람들이 만든 거로요

translation.en: Better get yourself a raincoat, Mal,
translation.ko: 우비를 챙기는 게 좋을 거예요, 맬

translation.en: because you've unleashed a shitstorm of biblical proportions.
translation.ko: 당신은 성서에나 나올 법한 폭풍을 일으켰으니까요

translation.en: Fucking hell!
-Harriet! -Minister.
-Ronnie! -Don't worry, I'm not staying.
Just a little happy snap for your family album.
translation.ko: 그냥 가족 앨범에 넣을 사진 한 장 드리려고요

translation.en: Where'd you get this?
I don't know, which is why you should be worried.
Vindictiveness is never an attractive quality, Harriet.
Misuse of Mining Union funds
for campaigning and branch-stacking is one thing, Mal,
translation.ko: 선거 운동과 계파 조직에 막 갖다 쓴 것과

translation.en: but a Federal Minister failing to disclose an arrest record is a new low.
translation.ko: 연방 장관이 체포 기록을 숨긴 건 차원이 다른 문제죠

translation.en: Should I give you my BSB and account details now
translation.ko: 지금 내 BSB 번호랑 계좌 정보 알려줄 테니

translation.en: so you can make those defamation payments direct this time?
translation.ko: 명예 훼손 배상금 이번엔 직접 보내줄래요?

translation.en: I'm not touching that.
I've banged my head against the Paxton wall enough.
translation.ko: 팩스턴이란 이름의 벽은 칠 만큼 쳐봤어요

translation.en: So, what's this? Just a friendly warning?
translation.ko: 그럼 이건 뭐죠? 그냥 친구로서의 경고요?

translation.en: Not friendly.
-Thomas. -Hey.
When you get a minute, can you check this for a remote breach?
translation.ko: 시간 나면 원격 침입 확인 좀 해줄래?

translation.en: Someone deleted a crime-scene photo.
Was it us?
Oh, could be ASIO, ASIS, CIA, MSS, take your pick.
The Dalgetty phone. Where'd you get this?
The director. Came in from the Federal Police.
translation.ko: 국장님이 주셨어요 연방 경찰 쪽에서 온 건데

translation.en: Vaughn wants the data retrieved.
Hey, Thomas, that phone I just gave you,
translation.ko: 저기, 토머스 지금 내가 준 전화기는

translation.en: let's just keep that between us, okay?
Um... Sure, Kim.
Attorney, can I have one minute?
You can have 20 meters to the treasurer's office while I send a tweet.
translation.ko: 재무 장관실까지 20m인데 트윗 보낼 동안 얘기해요

translation.en: Paxton's going to build the submarines in Australia?
I'm sure he has his reasons, at this critical time.
translation.ko: 이 중요한 시기에 이러는 건 무슨 이유가 있는 게 분명하죠

translation.en: As in, don't tie Australia to an alliance against Beijing
translation.ko: 이를테면, 사빈 홉스가 중국 교도소에서 썩고 있는데

translation.en: while Sabine Hobbs rots in a Chinese prison?
You know the rules. Deep background only.
translation.ko: 인용도 언급도 안 되는 거 알잖아요

translation.en: If you want a quote, go to Paxton.
translation.ko: 한 마디 따고 싶으면 팩스턴한테 가요

translation.en: But either way, wouldn't most Labor MPs support him?
translation.ko: 노동당 의원 대부분이 팩스턴을 지지하지 않을까요?

translation.en: Not if it means risking the U.S. alliance.
It's the last article of faith for the Right,
the only thing keeping my faction together.
Well, that and their fear of you, attorney.
Thank you, Harriet.
I need to speak to you.
How did that photo get out?
Hey, Sasha, do me a favor
and look into why Mal Paxton was in China circa 20 years ago.
translation.ko: 맬 팩스턴이 20여 년 전에 왜 중국에 있었는지 알아봐 줘

translation.en: Like was it a study trip or a Union junket?
Give me a sec.
Already checked it.
In June 1992, he was on a Young Labor delegation to Beijing.
Who was head of mission then?
Well, I am reliably informed
that you are the resident expert on all things China, Mr. Rankin.
translation.ko: 중국에 관해 모르는 게 없는 전문가시라고요, 랭킨 씨

translation.en: I wouldn't say expert. Aficionado, maybe.
You were there before and after Tiananmen.
translation.ko: 천안문 사태 당시 베이징에 계셨던 거죠

translation.en: Indeed, um, and despite the trouble,
China was modernizing and we had cause for optimism.
translation.ko: 중국은 근대화 중이었고 낙관할 근거가 있었어요

translation.en: A lot of senior Australians visiting, too.
Oh, I did host a lot of important people, from the Prime Minister down.
translation.ko: 제가 총리님부터 해서 중요 인사를 많이 모셨죠

translation.en: I suppose some of them weren't such big names,
translation.ko: 몇 명은 그 당시에는 유명하지 않았지만

translation.en: but emerged later, like Malcolm Paxton.
I understand that he was in Beijing for several months in 1992?
translation.ko: 1992년에 맬컴 팩스턴이 몇 달간 베이징에 있었죠?

translation.en: Yes, I do recall that he was there.
Was there a diplomatic incident of some kind?
Police trouble?
I know that he was arrested,
and you were head of mission, so, you would know that, too.
translation.ko: 대표단 단장이셨으니 랭킨 씨도 아셨을 테고요

translation.en: Mr. Paxton has proven to be
a professional blindspot in the past for you, Ms. Dunkley.
translation.ko: 기자가 보지 못하는 게 있단 걸요, 덩클리 씨

translation.en: I would hate for history to repeat over such a trivial matter.
translation.ko: 그런 사소한 문제로 과거가 되풀이되는 걸 보긴 싫군요

translation.en: [Harriet] Just in case.
Thank you so much for the tea, Mr. Rankin.
Harriet Dunkley has just been here.
[Paxton] Prime minister.
Catriona tells me you set the cat amongst the pigeons, Mal.
No, I said the cat actually fucked the pigeons.
Mal's right.
Locking into Japanese subs would be taking sides.
translation.ko: 일본 잠수함으로 결정하면 편이 갈리게 될 겁니다

translation.en: Admit it, Mal. You and your Panda mates want to squirm away from allies
translation.ko: 인정해요, 맬 당신과 중국 친구들은 우리를 지켜온 동맹에서

translation.en: -who've had our backs-- -Since when? Since Vietnam, or Iraq?
Seriously, Catriona, with friends like those--
It's a bad time to commit to a new direction.
A silly girl sets herself on fire in Beijing,
and we betray our closest ally?
A prisoner swap has been raised.
-They're willing to deal? -Not in so many words.
Surely for the right offer.
America will not let Beijing put a chokehold on world trade.
translation.ko: 중국이 세계 무역을 거머쥐도록 미국이 놔두지 않을 거예요

translation.en: Why do you think they've pivoted towards Asia?
The dragon has stirred and needs to be contained.
For fuck's sake, we're not joining a new arms race
and isolating our biggest trading partner.
translation.ko: 최대 무역 상대국을 고립시킬 순 없어요

translation.en: Marty?
You've seen the polls.
Until Sabine Hobbs gets home,
we do nothing that might upset Beijing.
-Do you mind? -Don't let the Greens catch you.
You know how they feel about old-growth forests.
Mal Paxton has killed the plan to buy Soryu subs in Japan.
translation.ko: 일본 소류급 잠수함 도입안을 맬 팩스턴이 무산시켰어요

translation.en: Avoid offending Beijing while they hold Sabine Hobbs.
translation.ko: 사빈 홉스 때문에 중국 눈치를 보는 거죠

translation.en: -Have you got a quote from Paxton? -Not exactly on his Christmas card list.
translation.ko: - 팩스턴한테 딴 거야? - 그 정도로 친하진 않잖아요

translation.en: -Give it to someone Paxton'll talk to. -Please, Gus, not Griff.
translation.ko: - 만나줄 만한 사람한테 넘겨 - 거스, 그리프는 안 돼요

translation.en: He's running national political on Hobbs. And what about your drowned kid?
translation.ko: 홉스 건은 그리프 담당이야 익사체는 어떻게 됐어?

translation.en: Uh, the photo was wiped from my phone.
translation.ko: 제 전화기에 있던 시신 사진이 지워졌어요

translation.en: Some kind of hack. Kim's looking into it.
translation.ko: 일종의 해킹 같은데 킴이 조사 중이에요

translation.en: Still got your ex-husband doing your dirty work. [clears throat]
-What's this? -Sabine Hobbs press pack.
translation.ko: - 이게 뭔데요? - 사빈 홉스 보도 자료

translation.en: -Make head office happy. -Don't make me do a puff piece.
translation.ko: - 본사 비위 좀 맞춰 - 이런 일 시키지 마요

translation.en: Human interest is for journos interested in humans.
I do politicians.
It's the last days of the dinosaurs, Harri.
Circulation's plummeting, my gold retirement watch is ticking
translation.ko: 판매 부수가 급감하고 내 은퇴는 다가오는데

translation.en: and you're still in the doghouse.
Close the door on your way out.
[woman on TV] Nine months ago,
Sabine Hobbs won the prestigious Beijing Music Academy Scholarship,
translation.ko: 사빈 홉스는 권위 있는 베이징 음악원의 장학생이 되어

translation.en: resulting in her now infamous and ill-fated trip to China.
translation.ko: 끔찍하고 불행하게 끝난 중국 유학길에 올랐죠

translation.en: Sabine's mother Diane also saw Sabine in the Beijing prison, and was satisfied...
translation.ko: 사빈의 어머니 다이앤도 교도소에서 딸을 보고...

translation.en: [Sasha] Self-immolation has a long history in Buddhism.
It's the ultimate act of dissent against oppression.
The Vietnamese monk Quang Duc called it "a donation to the struggle."
translation.ko: 베트남 승려 쿠앙 둑은 '투쟁에의 공양'이라고 했어요

translation.en: Sabine is a peace-loving advocate for a free Tibet.
translation.ko: 사빈은 평화를 사랑하는 티베트 독립 지지자예요

translation.en: This was an act of naïve protest.
The government knows it. Everyone knows it except for China.
translation.ko: 중국 정부를 제외한 모두가 아는 사실이에요

translation.en: My daughter is no terrorist...
Is there anything new here, or are we just regurgitating a press pack?
translation.ko: 뭐 새로운 거 있어? 아니면 그냥 반복이야?

translation.en: [Toohey] Ladies and gentlemen, I want you to welcome
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 박수로 맞아주십시오 "호주 국립 미술관"

translation.en: the new United States Ambassador to Australia, Mr. Brent Moreton.
translation.ko: 신임 호주 주재 미국 대사 브렌트 모턴 씨입니다

translation.en: Thank you very much, Mr. Prime Minister.
I'm a simple man.
I attended college on a football scholarship,
which probably tells you just how simple.
So, instead of giving a speech of my own invention,
translation.ko: 그러니 저 나름의 연설을 하는 대신

translation.en: I will instead tell you what the president said to me as I was leaving.
He called me into the Oval Office and said to me,
"Brent, there's no greater friendship, no truer alliance than that which exists
translation.ko: '호주와 미국보다 우애 깊고 진실한 동맹 관계는'

translation.en: between Australia and the United States.
And that's why I'm sending you down there,
because no matter how hard you try, even you can't screw it up."
translation.ko: '아무리 애를 써봤자 망칠 수 없을 테니까요'

translation.en: Thank you.
So, how are you finding Canberra, ambassador?
-Cold. -Yes.
You never really get used to it.
Minister, this is going to feel tropical
translation.ko: 장관님, 여기 날씨는 열대처럼 느껴질 겁니다

translation.en: compared to the fucking freezer the White House is gonna put you in.
translation.ko: 백악관이 당신을 처넣을 냉동고에 비교하면 말이죠

translation.en: News does travel fast.
Congratulations on your appointment, ambassador.
Thank you, ambassador.
-My wife, Weng Meihui. -[Moreton] An absolute pleasure.
translation.ko: - 제 아내 웽 메이후이입니다 - 만나 봬서 영광입니다

translation.en: We haven't met. I'm Mal Paxton.
[Harriet] So, you both sang with Sabine Hobbs?
translation.ko: 두 분 다 사빈 홉스랑 함께 노래하셨군요?

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes.
-Beautiful voice. -Like an angel.
How do you feel about her 20-year prison sentence?
-I am sad for her family. -Yeah.
Did Sabine have any involvement with dissident groups...
like Falun Gong, or the Uyghurs, or Free Tibet, that you knew of?
translation.ko: 파룬궁이나, 위구르나 티베트 독립, 그런 단체들요

translation.en: Hey.
My body in the lake?
He was in the same choir at ANU as Sabine Hobbs.
translation.ko: ANU에서 사빈 홉스랑 같은 합창단에 있었어요

translation.en: Good day for the dinosaurs.
Miss Dunkley.
Mae Lin.
You do realize I'm not authorized to speak to media regarding Sabine Hobbs.
translation.ko: 사빈 홉스에 관해서는 말씀 못 드리는 거 아시죠?

translation.en: Of course.
I'm actually here about the Beijing Music Academy scholarship,
translation.ko: 제가 여쭤보려는 건 베이징 음악원 장학제도예요

translation.en: of which Sabine Hobbs was a recipient.
-Yes? -I'm curious as to your role, Mae Lin.
Do you liaise directly with prospective applicants
at the ANU Chinese Choral Society, for instance?
Well, I represent the program at various educational institutions.
translation.ko: 저는 여러 교육기관에서 본 프로그램을 대표합니다

translation.en: -Oh. -Including ANU.
Conducting information seminars...
attending ceremonies with the ambassador's wife, and so on.
translation.ko: 대사님 부인을 모시고 행사에 참석하는 등입니다

translation.en: Do you remember meeting a Max Dalgetty?
Not that I recall.
Miss Dunkley, I have a meeting now.
translation.ko: 덩클리 씨 제가 지금 회의가 있어서요

translation.en: [Harriet] Thank you...
for your time.
[Thomas] Kim? That phone you gave me?
[Kim] How'd you go?
Back-door exploit.
Pretty sophisticated.
Untraceable.
Can you permanently delete it?
Yes.
[Kim] Harri.
Someone saw us yesterday.
There's surveillance footage.
Everybody knows about us, Kim.
-It's in all of your disclosures. -This is a serious warning.
translation.ko: - 네 정보에 다 나와 - 진지하게 경고하는 거야

translation.en: What, you think someone's closing ranks to cover an agency fuckup?
translation.ko: 기관 실수를 덮으려고 누군가 협조한다는 거야?

translation.en: As long as you're following Dalgetty, we cannot meet,
translation.ko: 네가 달게티를 쫓는 한 우린 못 만나

translation.en: we cannot speak, we cannot have any contact,
translation.ko: 얘기도 못 하고 어떤 연락도 못 해

translation.en: and if you breathe the words "intelligence sources,"
translation.ko: 네가 '정보 출처'를 입 밖에 내기라도 하면

translation.en: I'll lose my job.
You haven't given me anything, Kim.
I don't want to end up in a Russian share house with Snowden.
translation.ko: 난 에드워드 스노든처럼 신세 망치기 싫어

translation.en: Can I have my phone?
-Did you get the photo back? -No, we couldn't find it. Expert job.
You lie so well.
Anyone would think that you had years of practice.
translation.ko: 누가 보면 몇 년이나 연습한 줄 알겠어

translation.en: -Hi. -Hey.
Harriet had Max Dalgetty's photo on her phone. From the lake.
translation.ko: 해리엇이 호수에서 맥스 달게티 사진을 찍었어

translation.en: Really?
Someone hacked in. Wiped it.
If Dalgetty's an agency fuckup, it's a pretty big one.
translation.ko: 달게티가 기관 실수라면 아주 큰 건인가 봐

translation.en: That'd explain why Vaughn's so worked up.
I saw him today, Dalgetty.
translation.ko: 오늘 그 남자 봤어 달게티 말이야

translation.en: Sliced open while he was still alive, pathologist said.
translation.ko: 법의학자 말로는 산 채로 배를 열었대

translation.en: Whatever he swallowed, they got it.
Was he on the radar?
No. He is now, though. Beijing made sure of that.
translation.ko: 아니, 근데 이제 끌게 됐지 중국 정부 덕분에

translation.en: It's not exactly a good look...
letting MSS run around Canberra knocking off an ANU student, on our soil.
translation.ko: MSS가 우리 땅을 활보하면서 ANU 학생을 죽이게 두다니

translation.en: We should be taking a hard look at our friend from the embassy.
She's running someone, Dancer, she has to be.
translation.ko: 누군가를 부리는 거야 그럴 수밖에 없어

translation.en: All our protocols have been tightened.
And still there are things that China knows that it has no right to know.
translation.ko: 중국은 여전히 몰라야 할 걸 알고 있어

translation.en: Unless they've got a high-level sleeper.
If you're looking at porn, I'm offended.
translation.ko: 포르노 보는 거면 나 화낼 거야

translation.en: I'm looking through that list that you e-mailed.
Searching the faculty records for students in the Chinese Choral Society.
translation.ko: 중국어 합창단 학생들 학부 기록을 찾아보는 중이야

translation.en: Ah. Kevin Dang. I know him. He's in my computer science tute.
translation.ko: 케빈 댕, 누군지 알아 내 컴퓨터 공학 수업 들어

translation.en: [sighs] There's no record of a Max Dalgetty.
He's never been enrolled in ANU.
You off so soon?
Guess I'll see you next time you're lonely and desperate.
translation.ko: 아마 외롭고 간절할 때 다시 날 찾아오겠지

translation.en: Then I guess I'll see you soon.
The, uh, Dalgetty investigation's been shut down.
Shut down?
-Any particular reason? -Inter-agency matter.
[man] Who've we got?
Lloyd Rankin, 63, asphyxiation.
Find out who he called last.
-Mr. Rankin? -[Brimmer] Who is this, please?
[in Chinese] Please. Why am I here?
[in Chinese] You stole a classified MSS file.
I swear, I didn't...
You sent the file to this man.
You killed him.
[in Chinese] No. You did.
The journalist. Dunkley?
You will tell us what she knows.
Tell us.
